#include <stdio.h>
 
int main() {
	int t,n,i;
	long long start,end,a,b;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
	    int flag=0;
	    scanf("%lld %lld",&start,&end);
	    scanf("%d",&n);
	    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	    {
	        scanf("%lld %lld",&a,&b);
	        if(!(a>=end || b<=start))
	        {
	            
	            flag=1;
	            
	        }
	        
	        
	    }
	    if(flag==0)
	        printf("YES\n");
	    else
	        printf("NO\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
